mapper.select: SELECT ID, RSV_DATE, TITLE, E.NAME AS RSV_NAME, R.EMP_NO, START_TIME, END_TIME, DETAIL, MEMO FROM RESERVATION AS R JOIN EMP_MST AS E ON R.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO WHERE date_format(RSV_DATE, '%Y%m%d') LIKE #{currentMonth}

SELECT TITLE, E.NAME AS RSV_NAME, START_TIME, END_TIME, ID, R.EMP_NO, RSV_DATE FROM RESERVATION AS R JOIN EMP_MST AS E ON R.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO WHERE date_format(RSV_DATE, '%Y%m%d') = #{reservationDate}
SELECT ID, RSV_DATE, TITLE, E.NAME AS RSV_NAME, R.EMP_NO, START_TIME, END_TIME, DETAIL, MEMO FROM RESERVATION AS R JOIN EMP_MST AS E ON R.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION ( RSV_DATE, TITLE, RSV_NAME, EMP_NO, START_TIME, END_TIME, DETAIL, MEMO) VALUES ( #{rsvDate}, #{title}, #{rsvName}, #{empNo}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{detail}, #{memo})
